item.title: My blog is back
item.description: It’s been quite some time since my last article, and I must admit, my activity has been sparse. However, I’m determined to change that. This article serves as a personal reminder to encourage me to write more thought-provoking posts. There’s an abundance of topics to discuss, but unfortunately, I seldom allocate time for writing. So, today marks the beginning of a new chapter. From now on, I will strive to write at least one post per week.
